messages.message:
@Venkatesh @jack.robbins @Serena @ayesha.ali

Hey team, when testing uploads with larger files the UI becomes unresponsive since we are rendering out the all contents of the csv. Do we have an upper file size limit defined for uploads, or should we be setting one?
hmm do you know at what csv file size the UI becomes unresponsive?

~is it more than 50mb? https://docs.instabase.com/overview/limitations~

Ignore me, I realize this is for the options creator...
Can we make that a dropdown selector?
even 1mb :sweat_smile: because we're rendering each tag. For reference VRSF is like 4kb... which renders like 100 or so tags
@Sayan we're showing a list of options for the field value, so a dropdown is not ideal for this purpose

can you start a thread in <#C0941MX3PHR|> and tag Natasha to get her thoughts? i think that showing >100 tags in this UI is not user-friendly

if we want to stick with this UI since we already have it implemented, we could do pagination? ex: P. 1 of X, and show 100 tags at a time
(but this is not a great UX obviously :sweat:)
